header.title: AI Prompt Guide
header.subtitle: Advanced AI prompting techniques and optimization for maximum testing effectiveness

introduction.title: Master AI Prompting
introduction.description: Learn how to write effective prompts that get the best results from AI-powered testing.

promptPrinciples.title: Core Prompting Principles
promptPrinciples.description: Follow these principles for effective AI communication:

clarity.title: 1. Be Clear and Specific
clarity.description: Use precise language and avoid ambiguity
clarity.example:
Good: 'Click the blue Submit button in the footer'
Bad: 'Click the button'

context.title: 2. Provide Context
context.description: Give the AI enough context to understand the scenario
context.example:
Good: 'After logging in, navigate to user profile settings'
Bad: 'Go to settings'

structure.title: 3. Use Logical Structure
structure.description: Organize steps in a logical, sequential order
structure.example:
Good: Step-by-step instructions with clear flow
Bad: Jumping between unrelated actions

validation.title: 4. Include Validation
validation.description: Always specify what should be verified
validation.example:
Good: 'Verify the success message appears'
Bad: 'Submit the form' (without validation)

advancedTechniques.title: Advanced Techniques
advancedTechniques.description: Sophisticated prompting strategies for complex scenarios:

conditionalLogic.title: Conditional Logic
conditionalLogic.description: Handle different scenarios based on page state or data
conditionalLogic.example: If user is already logged in, skip login and go to dashboard

errorHandling.title: Error Handling
errorHandling.description: Anticipate and handle potential errors gracefully
errorHandling.example: If login fails, capture error message and retry with different credentials

dynamicContent.title: Dynamic Content
dynamicContent.description: Work with content that changes based on data or state
dynamicContent.example: Select the first available product from the search results

multiStepFlows.title: Multi-Step Flows
multiStepFlows.description: Break complex workflows into manageable steps
multiStepFlows.example: Complete checkout process: cart → shipping → payment → confirmation

optimization.title: Prompt Optimization
optimization.description: Strategies to improve performance and reduce costs:

tokenEfficiency.title: Token Efficiency
tokenEfficiency.description: Write concise prompts that achieve maximum results with minimal tokens
tokenEfficiency.tips: • Use action verbs • Avoid redundant descriptions • Focus on essentials

reusability.title: Reusable Patterns
reusability.description: Create prompt templates for common scenarios
reusability.tips: • Standard login flows • Form validation patterns • Navigation sequences

testing.title: Prompt Testing
testing.description: Test and refine prompts using the Test Recorder
testing.tips: • Use Test Recorder for experimentation • A/B test different approaches • Monitor success rates

ecommerce.description: Complete purchase flow with cart, shipping, and payment

dashboard.title: Dashboard Interaction
dashboard.description: Complex dashboard navigation and data manipulation

issues.elementNotFound: • Element not found → Use semantic descriptions instead of technical selectors
issues.ambiguousInstructions: • Ambiguous instructions → Add more context and specific details
issues.timingIssues: • Timing issues → Add explicit wait conditions
issues.validationFailures: • Validation failures → Be more specific about expected outcomes
